description: W-1 Project Scaffolding - Set up foundational Next.js codebase with TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Drizzle ORM schema

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a Next.js project with App Router and TypeScript so I can build a type-safe modern web application.
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14+ installed with App Router enabled
TypeScript configured with strict mode in tsconfig.json
tsconfig.json includes appropriate compiler options
Project runs with npm run dev on localhost:3000
No TypeScript compilation errors
package.json includes all necessary Next.js dependencies
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Configure Tailwind CSS with dark mode
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Tailwind CSS configured so I can use utility-first styling throughout the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Tailwind CSS installed and configured
tailwind.config.ts includes dark mode configuration with class strategy
Global CSS file imports Tailwind directives
Test div with bg-blue-500 renders blue background
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Establish project directory structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the project organized with clear separation of concerns so code is maintainable as the application grows.
acceptanceCriteria: app/ directory follows App Router conventions
app/(auth)/ directory created
app/(dashboard)/ directory created
app/api/ directory created
lib/db/ directory created
lib/queries/ directory created
lib/calculations/ directory created
lib/services/ directory created
components/dashboard/ directory created
components/forms/ directory created
components/charts/ directory created
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Install and configure shadcn/ui
userStories.description: As a developer, I need shadcn/ui installed so I can use consistent, accessible UI components.
acceptanceCriteria: shadcn/ui CLI initialized with appropriate configuration
components.json created with correct paths
Base components installed: Button, Card, Dialog, Input, Label, Form, Select, Tabs
lib/utils.ts exists with cn() helper function
components/ui/ directory contains installed components
Button component renders without errors when imported
Typecheck passes
Verify Button component in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Define Drizzle ORM schema for all database tables
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the complete database schema defined so the data model is documented in code, ready for migration when database connection is available.
acceptanceCriteria: Drizzle ORM packages installed: drizzle-orm, drizzle-kit, @neondatabase/serverless
drizzle.config.ts created with placeholder connection string
lib/db/schema.ts created with all table definitions
users table schema defined with id, email, name, created_at
holdings table schema defined with all fields including type enum, currency enum, foreign key to users
transactions table schema defined with foreign key to holdings, action enum BUY/SELL
snapshots table schema defined with unique constraint on (holding_id, date)
contributions table schema defined with foreign key to holdings
price_cache table schema defined with symbol, price, currency, fetched_at
All enums defined: HoldingType, Currency, TransactionAction, Exchange
TypeScript types exported from schema
No migration files generated
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create base layout component with header
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a root layout with header placeholder so the application shell is ready for content.
acceptanceCriteria: app/layout.tsx exists as root layout
Layout includes proper HTML structure with html and body tags
Tailwind CSS imported in layout
Dark mode class applied to html element
Header component shows Mjölnir app name
Header styled with Tailwind dark background
Main content area uses {children} slot
Layout renders without errors
Typecheck passes
Verify layout in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create placeholder homepage with Button component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a simple homepage to verify the entire setup works end-to-end.
acceptanceCriteria: app/page.tsx created with basic content
Page displays Mjölnir as h1 heading
Page includes shadcn/ui Button component
Button has visible text
Page uses Tailwind classes for styling
No console errors when viewing page
Typecheck passes
Verify page in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Configure development tooling and scripts
userStories.description: As a developer, I need ESLint and development scripts configured so code quality is maintained.
acceptanceCriteria: ESLint configured (comes with Next.js)
npm run lint executes without errors
npm run build completes successfully
.gitignore includes node_modules, .next, .env*.local, drizzle/
package.json scripts include: dev, build, start, lint
Typecheck passes
